sentences.sContent: He tried hard to appear calm .
sentences.sCn: 他努力让自己显得镇静。

sentences.sContent: I don’t want to appear rude.
The right colours can make a small room appear much bigger.
sentences.sCn: 颜色运用恰当可以使小房间显得大很多。

trans.tranCn: 出现， 显露， 公开露面； 出场， 问世； 仿佛， 似乎
trans.tranOther: used to say that someone or something seems to have a particular quality or feeling
